sources.title: The Outcasts Of Poker Flat ( 1952)
sources.description: Trapped in a snowbound mountain cabin, an assortment of travelers receives the unwelcome visit of a wanted outlaw. Starring Cameron Mitchell, Dale Robertson, Anne Baxter Based on the story by Bret Harte. IMDB

metadata.Plot: A murderous western outlaw, his wife, a disgraced gambler and a faded dance hall floozie and a few other socially undesirable characters are trapped in a snowbound mountain cabin. As the chances for rescue fade, the true natures of the cabin's occupants rise to the surface.
metadata.Actors: Anne Baxter, Dale Robertson, Miriam Hopkins
